original_text: So Jehoiachin put off his prison garments. And every day of his life he dined regularly at the king's table,
korean_text: 그 죄수의 의복을 갈아 입혔고 그의 평생 동안 항상 왕의 앞에서 먹게 하였으며

sentences.original_text: So Jehoiachin put off his prison garments.
And every day of his life
he dined regularly at the king's table,
